text: we've dealt with a lot of heavy topics
these last few weeks well casters for
each of those painful experiences the
messages have been the same you can heal
and move on and be stronger your
lightning bolt scar can become a symbol
of Hope to others but when a
relationship ends abruptly or you lose
someone that you love how do you
transition from a place of pain to a
place of healing today well casters
we're going to give you some tips on
capturing that all elusive gold golden
snitch closure tip one acknowledge your
feelings and don't run from them maybe
you feel wronged or misled by someone
you trusted or you've suffered some
injustice at the hands of a total
stranger identify your feelings and give
yourself permission to feel them get mad
if you're mad allow yourself to be hurt
if you're feeling vulnerable embrace
your suffering and don't try to reason
your way through its causes or fixes
tip two let it out bottled emotions are
no good for anybody and now that you've
identified your anguish release it try
venting to a close friend or scribbling
your well-cast journal to flush yourself
of negative energy express your positive
emotion too if your friends are moving
away take a moment to tell them how much
you'll miss them we guarantee that this
cathartic exercise will provide you with
at least a little sense of relief and
it'll help you get perspective
tip three give yourself time and space
be patient with yourself recognize that
just like with a physical wound
emotional healing is a gradual process
do other things you love rather than
just focusing on what's lost spend time
with other people in your life positive
influences these people will help build
you back up tip four forgive and we mean
actively
you might never receive that apology
that you so deserve but you got to
release that burden that's weighing you
down start by envisioning a future where
you've let go of the tension that this
situation caused then tie an action to
your forgiveness whether it's donating
painful objects and pictures or writing
a private blog post about what
happened give the situation the formal
resolution it never got so that's it
well casters be these were our tips for
getting you a few steps closer to
closure it's time for us here at well
cast to take a summer Hiatus I know I
know we've had some great times together
this year but never fear we'll be back
with season 2 in the fall post comments
below to tell us what you love from
season 1 and what you want to see next
season email wellc inside.com for more
information in the meantime we we hope
that when you need help on an issue in
the future you can find a family member
or an adult that you trust but hey you
can still visit this channel whenever
you need
us well that's all for me today well
casters would you do me a kindness
subscribe to our Channel Sign up for our
newsletter to receive sneak peeks and
other awesome stuff see you later
[Music]
